description: This is Behind the Blog, where we share our behind-the-scenes thoughts about how a few of our top stories of the week came together. This week, we discuss screwed-up telecom systems, tech exec sermons, and TikTok trends.
title: Behind the Blog: Screwed-Up Telecoms and Tech Sermons

description: Axon has been inviting police departments to webinars about the new AI-based product, which will automatically generate police reports based on bodycam audio, according to emails obtained by 404 Media.
title: Here Is What Axon’s Bodycam Report Writing AI Looks Like
